Most kids dream of growing up to be astronauts; but the downside of spending extended amounts of time in low gravity is that astronauts' muscles tend to shrink and weaken through disuse.
Now, resear… [+2927 chars]

articles.author: Reynard Jenning
articles.title: Researchers find 100 black holes in globular clusters - Broadway.me
articles.description: Researchers at the University of Barcelona examined the globular cluster Palomar 5. They discovered about 100 black holes in it. This artist's impression
